bibl.title: The Notitia Dignitatum and the Geography of Egypt. Observations on Some Military Camps and Place Names in Upper Egypt.
bibl.note: Discusses a few toponyms occurring in § 31 of the section on the Orient in the Notitia Dignitatum and in the Itinerarium Antonini Augusti.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists

bibl.seg: WORP K.A., The Notitia Dignitatum and the Geography of Egypt. Observations on Some Military Camps and Place Names in Upper Egypt.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 463-469, 1 carte.
Discusses a few toponyms occurring in § 31 of the section on the Orient in the Notitia Dignitatum and in the Itinerarium Antonini Augusti.
